name: Bubble Shooter Cookie
description:
Bubble Shooter Cookie is not like other bubble shooter games which block your progress and let you pay!
This bubble shooting game is easy but fun. Bubble Shooter Cookie is kind of a game makes you feel extra relaxing and pull you out of worries.

Have a try now, it's completely free!

Highlighted Features

* Easy but creative and addictive levels.
* Multiple new boosters help with challenging levels.  
* Well-designed 1000+ levels and new levels come every week.
* Sync your progress on Facebook, and take on your friends to compete for the best score.
* Free use of booster with just a short ads

Feel free to contact us to support@kudo.games and tell us how do you like the game!
